com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice
Interface IExternalDataSubsetCreationService

public interface IExternalDataSubsetCreationService

A set of methods for creating subsets of data from an external data provider by performing searches of various kinds against that external data provider.

Since:
3.1

Method Summary
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier dumbbellSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, SearchNode fromEntity, SearchNode link, SearchNode toEntity)
          Searches an external data source for dumbbells that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier expand(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, List<ItemIdentifier> seedItemIdentifiers, List<String> throughLinkTypes, List<String> toEntityTypes, int maxNumberOfLinks, boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks)
          Finds Links in an external data provider with the specified types (together with their associated ends), connected to the Entitys with the specified ItemIdentifiers.
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier fullTextSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString)
          Searches an external data provider for Items whose content includes the specified String, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier networkSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
          Searches an external data source for groups of Items that together meet the assembled criteria of the nodes in a network, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
 ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
          Searches an external data provider for Items that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.
 

Method Detail

fullTextSearch

ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier fullTextSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier,
                                            String searchString)
                                            throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                   ValidationException,
                                                   SetSizeExceededException,
                                                   ExternalDataSourceException
Searches an external data provider for Items whose content includes the specified String, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

Parameters:
subsetIdentifier - The ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that this method will populate and return.
searchString - A String containing some text that matching Items must contain.
Returns:
An ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that identifies the created external data subset.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
SetSizeExceededException - If a set is too large to be searched.
ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during querying for the external data subset.

search

ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier,
                                    String searchString,
                                    SetInfo setInfo,
                                    ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds,
                                    FilterInfoList filterInfos)
                                    throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                           ValidationException,
                                           SetSizeExceededException,
                                           ExternalDataSourceException
Searches an external data provider for Items that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

Items can be included in or excluded from the external data subset depending on whether they:

  • Contain a specified String
  • Appear in a set owned by a specified Item
  • Have an ItemType with a specified identifier
  • Contain Propertys or metadata with specified (ranges of) values

Parameters:
subsetIdentifier - The ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that this method will populate and return.
searchString - A String containing some text that matching Items must contain, or null to match all Items.
setInfo - A SetInfo that specifies the Item that owns the set that matching Items must be in, or null to match all Items.
itemTypeIds - An ItemTypeIdList containing the identifiers for the ItemTypes that matching Items must have, or null to match all Items.
filterInfos - A FilterInfoList defining Property and metadata values that matching Items must have, or null to match all Items. This parameter must be null when itemTypeIds identifies more than one ItemType.
Returns:
An ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that identifies the created external data subset.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
SetSizeExceededException - If a set is too large to be searched.
ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during querying for the external data subset.

expand

ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier expand(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier,
                                    List<ItemIdentifier> seedItemIdentifiers,
                                    List<String> throughLinkTypes,
                                    List<String> toEntityTypes,
                                    int maxNumberOfLinks,
                                    boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks)
                                    throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                           TooManyItemsException,
                                           TooManySeedsException,
                                           ExternalDataSourceException
Finds Links in an external data provider with the specified types (together with their associated ends), connected to the Entitys with the specified ItemIdentifiers. Creates an external data subset from the results and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

Parameters:
subsetIdentifier - The ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that this method will populate and return.
seedItemIdentifiers - The ItemIdentifiers of the Entitys connected to the Links to be added to the subset.
throughLinkTypes - Strings containing the identifiers of the LinkTypes of the Links to be added to the subset. If this parameter is null or empty, the operation is not constrained by the Link type.
toEntityTypes - Strings containing the identifiers of the EntityTypes of the Entitys at the other end of the Links to be added to the subset. If this parameter is null or empty, the operation is not constrained by the end Entity type.
maxNumberOfLinks - The maximum number of Links to be added to the subset.
shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks - true to throw an exception (and add no items to the subset) when the number of Links connected to the identified Entitys exceeds maxNumberOfLinks; false to throw no exception and add up to maxNumberOfLinks items. If maxNumberOfLinks is not exceeded, this parameter has no effect.
Returns:
An ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that identifies the created external data subset.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
TooManyItemsException - If more Items will be returned than the limit in maxNumberOfLinks, and shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks is true.
TooManySeedsException - If the specified ProvenanceGroups resolve to too many seed Entitys.
ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during querying for the external data subset.

dumbbellSearch

ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier dumbbellSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier,
                                            SearchNode fromEntity,
                                            SearchNode link,
                                            SearchNode toEntity)
                                            throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                   ValidationException,
                                                   ExternalDataSourceException
Searches an external data source for dumbbells that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

Parameters:
subsetIdentifier - The ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that this method will populate and return.
fromEntity - A SearchNode containing criteria that an Entity at the "from" end of a dumbbell must match.
link - A SearchNode containing criteria that the Link in a dumbbell must match.
toEntity - A SearchNode containing criteria that an Entity at the "to" end of a dumbbell must match.
Returns:
An ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that identifies the created external data subset.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during querying for the external data subset.

networkSearch

ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier networkSearch(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier,
                                           NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
                                           throws ExternalDataSourceException,
                                                  DataSizeException,
                                                  InvalidArgumentException,
                                                  NetworkSearchValidationException,
                                                  ValidationException
Searches an external data source for groups of Items that together meet the assembled criteria of the nodes in a network, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

Parameters:
subsetIdentifier - The ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that this method will populate and return.
networkSearchCriteria - A NetworkSearchNodeList that contains NetworkSearchNodes that define the criteria and structure that Items must match.
Returns:
An ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier that identifies the created external data subset.
Throws:
DataSizeException - If the search cannot be processed because it matches too much data.
ExternalDataSourceException - If an error occurs during querying for the external data subset.
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
NetworkSearchValidationException - If one of the following network structure rules is broken, or if any other network search validation error occurs:
  • A network must contain at least one NetworkSearchNode.
  • Every NetworkSearchNode must be connected to at least one other NetworkSearchNode, unless there is only one EntityNetworkSearchNode in the network.
  • Every LinkNetworkSearchNode must be connected to two EntityNetworkSearchNodes.
  • NetworkSearchNode identifiers must be unique within the network.
ValidationException - If a general validation error occurs.
Since:
4.0
